artist: Artist: Douglas Padilla; Artist: Packaged by Alexa Horochowski
creditline: Gift of the Weiser Family Foundation
description: packaged rectangular "collage" on corrugated plastic; pink ground with black and white smears; orange and green cross at center; red border with green and red lines and silver dots; packaged in plastic bag with cardboard hanging label stapled to top
dimension: 7 1/2 x 5 1/2 x 13/16 in. (19.05 x 13.97 x 2.06 cm) (including package)
signed: on back, in black: [Padilla / 2001 (on top of an orange dog)]
title: Abstract Expressionism, from Trinket Carro/Chuchería Cart
